channel.title: Adding Different Login Box
channel.description:
Okay I'm currently trying add new log in box to my client not exactly sure which one it's from I'll add a picture at the bottom the exact problem is it doesn't come out right when the client finishes loading if anyone could tell me how to change it around in order to make it work i would greatly appreciate it.
Edit: If anyone needs a picture of how the client looks when I try to add the log in box regularly through tom's cache editor I can upload a picture just request it I can add any extra information you guys may need.

item.title: Adding Different Login Box

Okay I’m currently trying add new log in box to my client not exactly sure which one it’s from I’ll add a picture at the bottom the exact problem is it doesn’t come out right when the client finishes loading if anyone could tell me how to change it around in order to make it work i would greatly appreciate it.
